subject: AI & Agents
title: Model Performance Monitoring
description: A micro-lesson that makes Model Performance Monitoring usable.

hook.text: Your model was 95% accurate at launch. Six months later, it's 80%. Nobody noticed.

buildup.text: Performance monitoring tracks accuracy, latency, error rates, and throughput in production.

discovery.text: Dashboard key metrics: P50/P99 latency, prediction distribution, error rate, and feature drift.

twist.text: Ground truth labels often arrive lateâ€”you may not know accuracy for days or weeks.

climax.text: Use proxy metrics (prediction confidence, distribution stability) until labels arrive.

punchline.text: If you're not watching, you're guessing.

quiz.question: Why are proxy metrics used in production monitoring?
options: Ground truth labels often arrive late
